usecase_studentlife.Rmd

Introduction to Dataset

See official site for more information.

studentlife.small

We downloaded gps and app data from three participants of the studentlife dataset.

library(fxtract)
head(studentlife.small)
##    timestamp provider network_type accuracy latitude longitude altitude
## 1 1364357009  network         wifi   67.993 43.70667 -72.28910      0.0
## 2 1364358209  network         wifi   23.000 43.70664 -72.28907      0.0
## 3 1364359405      gps                16.000 43.70668 -72.28902    136.3
## 4 1364360609  network         wifi   71.126 43.70667 -72.28909      0.0
## 5 1364361805      gps                16.000 43.70681 -72.28937    154.5
## 6 1364363013      gps                12.000 43.70681 -72.28902    130.8
##   bearing speed travelstate       date userId source device
## 1     0.0  0.00  stationary 2013-03-27      1    GPS   <NA>
## 2     0.0  0.00      moving 2013-03-27      1    GPS   <NA>
## 3    96.2  0.25             2013-03-27      1    GPS   <NA>

## 5     0.0  0.00             2013-03-27      1    GPS   <NA>

library(dplyr)
studentlife.small %>% distinct(userId)
##   userId
## 1      1
## 2      2
## 3      3

User Defined Functions

Number of different used apps in the morning

Let us define “morning” by 6am until 9am. The dataset does not have any information of the time of the day, but it is available via the UTC timestamp.
